牉字的基本解释

牉
pàn
一半，两个结合中的一方。
分为两半；泛指分开：“背膺牉以交痛兮。”

牉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pàn］
［《廣韻》普半切，去换，滂。］
(1)半分。谓一物中分为二。
(2)背离，离别。
(3)区分，别异。

牉字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【片字部】　牉； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页693第15
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?普半切，音泮。【玉篇】半也，分也。【楚辭·九章】背膺牉以交痛兮，心鬱結而紆軫。　又【儀禮·喪服傳】夫婦牉合也。【集韻】牉合，合其半，以成夫婦也。　【廣韻】亦作判。【集韻】或作片。

牉字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
牉字的起名意思

暂无。

牉
Basic explanation of words
牉
pàn
Half, one of the two combinations.
Divided into two halves; generally means to separate: "Sudden back to make painful."
牉
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pàn］
["Guangyun" is cut in half, go for it, punky. ]
(1) Half a minute. It means that one thing is divided into two.
(2) Deviation, parting.
(3) Distinguish, make no difference.
牉
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Centralized Collection] [Film Word Department] 　牉; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 693 No. 15
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Half cut in general, sound pan. 【Jade articles】Half and divided. [Nine Chapters of the Songs of the Chu] Back to back to the pain, the heart is depressed and stubborn.　[Rituals·Mourning Apparel Biography] Couples reunite. [Ji Yun] Combine, combine the other half, to become a married couple.　[Guangyun] also judged. [Ji Yun] Or make a film.
